column3: # = Empty (in some MARC serializations represented as '#')
column6: :w1 == bf:Work instance, :in1 == bf:Instance instance, :it1 == bf:Item instance. # == # or Empty.

column7: 003 code to Institution URI resolution?
column9: 12 characters, either digits or # character. | MARC Organization code.
column10: Control number i.e. record identifier within the originating system. | Institution whose system originated the control number in 001. Values taken from the databases here: http://www.loc.gov/marc/organizations/ Uncertain if these MARC Organization codes are available anywhere as LOD. This field is not always present, so we may need to derive the institution from other fields or convertor data sources.

column6:
bf:Work subclass (:w1 a) applied to resource, following this mapping:
a = bf:Text
c = bf:NotatedMusic
d = bf:NotatedMusic, create related bf:Instance and type bf:Manuscript
e = bf:Cartography
f = bf:Cartography, create related bf:Instance and type bf:Manuscript
g = Projected medium?
i = bf:Audio
j = bf:Audio
k = bf:StillImage
m = schema:SoftwareApplication
o = Kit?
p = bf:MixedMaterials
r = bf:Object
t = bf:Text, create related bf:Instance and type bf:Manuscript
column7: code to subclass converison.
column9:
Letter code, one of the following:
a - Language material
c - Notated music
d - Manuscript notated music
e - Cartographic material
f - Manuscript cartographic material
g - Projected medium
i - Nonmusical sound recording
j - Musical sound recording
k - Two-dimensional nonprojectable graphic
m - Computer file
o - Kit
p - Mixed materials
r - Three-dimensional artifact or naturally occurring object
t - Manuscript language material
column10: This is needed for understanding the 008 field as well.

column6:
Additional type or assertion applied to bf:Work resource. Not all values are mapped.
a = :w1 bf:issuance ld4l:MonographicPart
b = :w1 bf:issuance ld4l:SerialPart
c = :w1 a bf:Collection
d = do not map.
i = :w1 bf:issuance ld4l:IntegratingResource
m  = :w1 bf:issuance ld4l:Monograph
s = :w1 bf:issuance ld4l:Serial
column7: code to subclass converison.
column9:
Letter code, one of the following:
a - Monographic component part
b - Serial component part
c - Collection
d - Subunit
i - Integrating resource
m - Monograph/Item
s - Serial
column10: This is needed for understanding the 008 field as well.

column6:
Additional type applied to bf:Instance resource related to bf:Work resource.
# = do not map.
a = bf:Instance is also instance of subclass bf:Archival.
column7: code to subclass converison.
column9:
Letter or character code, one of the following:
# - No specified type
a - Archival
column10: The Archival subclass of Instance is still under discussion.

o - Photographs
p - Illuminations
| - No attempt to code
